title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 122 of 2004) are 
amended by substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as 
amended by the European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 302 of 
2019) the following- 

“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/90/EC of 6 
October 20032 as amended by Commission Implementing Directive 
(EU) 2019/1985 of 28 November 2019;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 122 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) (amendment) regulation 2019 (s.i no 302 2019) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 90 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2019 1985 28 november 2019

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 302 of 
2019) are revoked 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 February, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 O.J. No. L 308, 29.11.2019, p. 86 
2 O.J. No. L 254, 08.10.2003, p.7 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st February, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [48] 3

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2019/1985 of 29 November 2019 which amends Council 
Directive 2003/90/EC on the Characteristics and Minimum Conditions for 
Examining Agriculture Plant Species. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [48]
